title: Education & Learning
description: Learn vocabulary for discussing education, learning methods, and academic life.

words.meaning: the subjects taught in a school or course
words.example: The school has updated its curriculum to include more technology.
words.exampleTranslation: 학교가 더 많은 기술을 포함하도록 교육 과정을 업데이트했어요.

words.meaning: money paid for education; teaching
words.example: University tuition has increased significantly.

words.meaning: money given to a student to help pay for education
words.example: She won a scholarship to study abroad.

words.meaning: a piece of work given to students
words.example: The assignment is due next Friday.

words.meaning: the time by which something must be completed
words.example: I always try to meet my deadlines.

words.meaning: a formal talk on a subject
words.example: The professor gives lectures twice a week.

words.meaning: a class where students discuss a topic
words.example: We have a seminar on research methods.
words.exampleTranslation: 우리는 연구 방법에 대한 세미나가 있어요.

words.meaning: to complete studies; a person who has completed studies
words.example: She will graduate from university next year.

words.meaning: a qualification from a university
words.example: He has a degree in computer science.

words.meaning: careful study to find new information
words.example: The team is conducting research on climate change.
words.exampleTranslation: 그 팀은 기후 변화에 대한 연구를 하고 있어요.

words.meaning: to become officially recognized as able to do something
words.example: She qualified as a doctor last year.

words.meaning: a private teacher
words.example: I have a math tutor who helps me twice a week.
words.exampleTranslation: 일주일에 두 번 도와주는 수학 과외 선생님이 있어요.

words.meaning: to focus attention on something
words.example: I find it hard to concentrate when it's noisy.

words.meaning: to learn something so you can remember it exactly
words.example: You need to memorize these vocabulary words.

words.meaning: to study again before an exam
words.example: I need to revise for my exams next week.
words.exampleTranslation: 다음 주 시험을 위해 복습해야 해요.

words.meaning: to examine something carefully
words.example: We need to analyze the data from the experiment.

words.meaning: to give only the main points
words.example: Can you summarize the main ideas of the article?
words.exampleTranslation: 기사의 주요 내용을 요약해 줄 수 있어요?

words.meaning: related to education and schools
words.example: Her academic performance has improved.

words.meaning: related to real situations rather than theory
words.example: The course includes both theory and practical skills.
words.exampleTranslation: 이 과정은 이론과 실용적인 기술을 모두 포함해요.

words.meaning: having a strong desire to do something
words.example: Motivated students tend to perform better.
words.exampleTranslation: 동기 부여된 학생들이 성적이 더 좋은 편이에요.

words.meaning: producing the intended result
words.example: What's the most effective way to learn vocabulary?
words.exampleTranslation: 어휘를 배우는 가장 효과적인 방법은 뭐예요?

words.meaning: unable to concentrate because of something else
words.example: I get distracted easily by my phone.

words.meaning: able to speak a language smoothly and easily
words.example: She is fluent in three languages.

words.meaning: education that takes place over the internet
words.example: Online learning has become very popular.

words.meaning: the ability to analyze and evaluate ideas
words.example: Schools should teach critical thinking skills.

The _____ for submitting the essay is next Monday.

He has a master's _____ in economics.

The professor gives a _____ every Tuesday morning.
I get _____ easily when there's noise.
She _____ from university with honors last year.
_____ learning has become more popular since the pandemic.
